name: The Talent Games
description: An award-winning HR Technology company that empowers recruiting teams with gamified virtual hiring solutions. We're helping organizations attract, assess and hire top candidates remotely with online gamified assessments. We gamify and digitize the HR recruitment processes by combining Gamification and Neuroscience. Our technology stacks and games are EU data and GDPR compliant, we also have the ISO certification to our name. Till date, we have conducted 750,000+ candidate assessments for more than 50 clients across Asia, Africa, Oceania and Europe. Some of our clients are: Shell, Nestlé, Masan Group, IHH Healthcare Singapore, Novartis, Coca Cola, Bank Alfalah, Pfizer, FrieslandCampina Engro and CitiBank.

enhanced_description: The Talent Games is an award-winning HR Technology company specializing in gamified virtual hiring solutions. It empowers recruiting teams to attract, assess, and hire top candidates remotely through online gamified assessments. The platform digitizes HR recruitment processes by combining Gamification and Neuroscience, ensuring cheat-proof tests, in-depth analytics for better hiring decisions, and a secured platform with robust data protection. The technology is EU data and GDPR compliant and ISO certified. The company has successfully conducted over 750,000 candidate assessments for more than 50 clients globally, including Shell, Nestlé, Novartis, Coca Cola, and CitiBank, across Asia, Africa, Oceania, and Europe.
